PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: SIWARD, Earl of Northumberland, general of the English forces.
SEYTON, an officer attending on Macbeth.
Lords, Gentlemen, Officers, Soldiers, Murderers, Attendants, and Messengers.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A desert place.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Thunder and lightning. Enter three Witches

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A camp near Forres.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Alarum within. Enter DUNCAN, MALCOLM, DONALBAIN,
LENNOX, with Attendants, meeting a bleeding Sergeant

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A heath near Forres.
SCENE IV. Forres. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter DUNCAN, MALCOLM, DONALBAIN, LENNOX,
and Attendants

SPEECH.SPEAKER: DUNCAN
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter MACBETH, BANQUO, ROSS, and ANGUS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Inverness. Macbeth's castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter LADY MACBETH, reading a letter

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. Before Macbeth's castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Hautboys and torches. Enter DUNCAN, MALCOLM,
DONALBAIN, BANQUO, LENNOX, MACDUFF, ROSS, ANGUS,
and Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. Macbeth's castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Hautboys and torches. Enter a Sewer, and divers
Servants with dishes and service, and pass over the
stage. Then enter MACBETH

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Court of Macbeth's castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter BANQUO, and FLEANCE bearing a torch before him

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BANQUO
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter MACBETH, and a Servant with a torch

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same.
SCENE III. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Re-enter MACBETH and LENNOX, with ROSS
Exeunt all but Malcolm and Donalbain

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Outside Macbeth's castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter ROSS and an old Man

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Forres. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Sennet sounded. Enter MACBETH, as king, LADY
MACBETH, as queen, LENNOX, ROSS, Lords, Ladies, and
Attendants

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MACBETH
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Exeunt all but MACBETH, and an attendant

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter LADY MACBETH and a Servant

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A park near the palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter BANQUO, and FLEANCE with a torch

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. The same. Hall in the palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
A banquet prepared. Enter MACBETH, LADY MACBETH,
ROSS, LENNOX, Lords, and Attendants
First Murderer appears at the door

The GHOST OF BANQUO enters, and sits in
MACBETH's place
Exeunt all but MACBETH and LADY MACBETH

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. A Heath.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Thunder. Enter the three Witches meeting HECATE

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HECATE
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Music and a song within: 'Come away, come
away,' & c

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. Forres. The palace.
SCENE I. A cavern. In the middle, a boiling cauldron.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter HECATE to the other three Witches
Thunder. First Apparition: an armed Head
Thunder. Second Apparition: A bloody Child

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MACBETH
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Thunder. Third Apparition: a Child crowned,
with a tree in his hand

SCENE.STAGEDIR:
A show of Eight Kings, the last with a glass in
his hand; GHOST OF BANQUO following

Music. The witches dance and then vanish,
with HECATE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Fife. Macduff's castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter LADY MACDUFF, her Son, and ROSS

Exit LADY MACDUFF, crying 'Murder!' Exeunt
Murderers, following her

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. England. Before the King's palace.
SCENE I. Dunsinane. Ante-room in the castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter a Doctor of Physic and a Waiting-Gentlewoman

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Gentlewoman
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter LADY MACBETH, with a taper

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The country near Dunsinane.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Drum and colours. Enter MENTEITH, CAITHNESS, ANGUS,
LENNOX, and Soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Dunsinane. A room in the castle.
SCENE IV. Country near Birnam wood.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Drum and colours. Enter MALCOLM, SIWARD and YOUNG
SIWARD, MACDUFF, MENTEITH, CAITHNESS, ANGUS,
LENNOX, ROSS, and Soldiers, marching

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Dunsinane. Within the castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter MACBETH, SEYTON, and Soldiers, with drum
and colours

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. Dunsinane. Before the castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Drum and colours. Enter MALCOLM, SIWARD, MACDUFF,
and their Army, with boughs

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: They fight and YOUNG SIWARD is slain

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VIII. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Retreat. Flourish. Enter, with drum and colours,
MALCOLM, SIWARD, ROSS, the other Thanes, and Soldiers
